title: The Other Side of What
description: Is life determined by fate or by coincidence? Matthew soon finds out as he embarks on a new journey by moving to Memphis and leaving his small town home just to the north. Choosing to hide his past, he soon forms bonds with an overly dramatic Mississippi boy named Jacob and a passionate art dealer named Zo?. While discovering himself in a local club called Red Square but avoiding the dance floor, Matthew soon forms a secret friendship with an elusive drug dealer name Vance. Vance forces Matthew to face his past, and Matthew soon finds himself missing his mute brother, Ethan. However, it is Seth, a photography student, who forces Matthew to question his own choices and face the truth. The Other Side of What will have you questioning your own past as well; each page will make you stop and think about the truth!
author: Shannon  Yarbrough
